PROJECT DESCRIPTION
This project provides for equipping one production module (4 GD-4350 machines) with high speed tri-fold coupon placer capability. It includes the purchase of Thiele coupon placers, hot melt adhesive applicators, and adaptation of the GD-4350 machines.

lines.content: HIGH SPEED TRI-FOLD COUPON CAPABILITY/MACON BRANCH
This project provides for equipping one production module (4 GD-4350 machines) with
high speed tri-fold coupon placer capability. It includes the purchase of Thiele
coupon placers, hot melt adhesive applicators, and adaptation of the GD-4350 machines.

paragraphs.content: BROWN & WILLIAMSON TOBACCO CORPORATION CAPITAL BUDGET PROJECT
HIGH SPEED TRI-FOLD COUPON CAPABILITY/MACON BRANCH
1 x Maintenance of Existing Business 5 Compliance with Outside Requirements

This project provides for equipping one production module (4 GD-4350 machines) with high speed tri-fold coupon placer capability. It includes the purchase of Thiele coupon placers, hot melt adhesive applicators, and adaptation of the GD-4350 machines.
